comments.text:
become the next bubble to burst in the near future. There is no difference between a cash-based
chit fund scam and a visually sophisticated online gambling scam. Sadly the number of such
platforms has been on the rise since demonetisation, each year in different forms, and they
manage to get advertised by famous cricketers and movie stars as well (I'm referring to the
various sports based "gaming" betting apps). People should stop looking for shortcuts to make
quick money like their so called influencers and at least spend time reading about the terms and
conditions, the ownership details and other legal terms of the entities they put their hard earned
money into.
